General.Name: Huayi Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Huayi Electric Company Limited primarily operates in the electric equipment industry in China. It offers outdoor vacuum circuit breakers, isolating switches, and ring network cabinets. The company also engages in the sale of generator and generator sets; wind farm survey and design, and engineering construction consulting; and provision of indoor and outdoor vacuum circuit breakers, high and low voltage switchgear, and other products. In addition, it is involved in the sewage treatment, polluted soil ecological restoration, atmospheric environment governance, and ecological engineering. It serves electric power, petrochemical, metallurgy, railway, nuclear power, rail transit, municipal and environmental protection engineering, and metal and non-metal mines industries. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Yueqing, China. Huayi Electric Company Limited is a subsidiary of Huayi Group. Co., Ltd.
